This PR MUST match the PR NAMING CONVENTION below:

verb {single sentence summary of the feature} - AB#xxxxx (replace xxxxx with the story id from Azure Devops)

    The verb should be capitalized and in the imperative tense
    i.e. Add, Update, Fix, Refactor

    The summary will show up VERBATUM in the changelog for the next release.  Emojis are highly recommended for extra fun.
-->

# Type of change:
**Delete** the options that do not apply.

- [x] Bug Fix
- [x] Non-Breaking Change
- [x] Breaking Change

# Checklist:

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code.
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
- [ ] I have added or updated unit tests.
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
- [ ] Any dependent changes in other repositories have been merged.
